Clearmatics | London | Full Time | ONSITE

Clearmatics was founded in 2015 by Robert Sams with Vitalik Buterin as an advisor. The moral imperative of our company is to use technology to help the private sector and regulators re-engineer the infrastructure of capital markets to make it more transparent, less centralised, and resilient to counterparty failure.

Our technology stack enables distributed automation of post-trade processes, allowing dealers, end-users, and other members of the capital markets ecosystem to process trades through light-weight, consortium-governed Decentralised Clearing Networks (DCN's) rather than centralised post-trade intermediaries.

Weâ€™re a fast growing startup with paying clients, an open source software business model and a lucrative target market. This brings a number of benefits, including a high level of autonomy, a flat and intimate team structure, and a lack of bureaucracy. The Clearmatics team is small but experienced, driven by motivated people who want to build innovative solutions for a market undergoing rapid change since the financial crisis.
